unnormalised: Oikhom, nwngsrang mithiya nung je nंग'srangni khar-khar babonai kam-a besin gwswni bwrgaw monnwi jakhodon?
normalised: Nwi, bwiaboi, nwngthangmuna mithiyana di nungkhui bisinai bedongni bekhai jathabna laijabai?

unnormalised: IIT-Delhi ya lagunni frinwi ulunwi monnai (gwbaou thuna biryani arw mithai khou santwi naya!) ton poriman ni jwngar-bangar khar-khar khou babonai khami gadan composting system khamnanwi naykhodon.
normalised: I I T-Delhi ya gabon nwi composting system khou chalaijengdong, jikhaw biseslaiya ganna design khou bahani khonthaniyao lakhikhidong nwi gangkhi organic jakhini (mithai arw biryani ni dongkhani khanabou jidongkhou) ni berani.

unnormalised: Jongkha, bwidwrna jwngar-bangar khamphu fora dinwi khalini kharaw fwja Bollywood remake ni khamin besin nwnggong sombida. Arw gwi khaw Wall-E baijwng dongnwi nungkhaya phathai poriman ni khar jwng, naya nung?
normalised: Jojw, daobwi Bollywood remake ni khoubo jakhini khou gajurabai nwi jakhini dump gangkhani gaja jabai.

unnormalised: Be IIT ni project-a Ghazipur ni jwngar-bangar khamphu sima thangna gani khar poriman khou gwthangwi garmnwi khami, jejwng, sathwwnwi khanaya, bisin picnic jaha nungkhaya. Bikhri gwjwng poriman ni compost khalamnwi khami naya khalamdon, jejwng Haryana ni halwainfwrjwng babonwi monnwi jakhodon arw bisini chemical sar babonai khou garmnwi.
normalised: Arw jwng Wall-E ni jakhini ganjou laikhin, right?

unnormalised: Be system-a sanse kharaw boriborwi 500 kg khar khou babonwi monnwi, jwngar-bangar jwngra arw mablani gwrwmkhou boriborwi 2 saptaha ni kharaw posin gani masi sima khalamnwi. Bisantwi naya, bisini bwisa monnai gandari bisibkhou jini babonwi monnwi jin khaw khalamnwi! Bikhou besin gwjwng khalamnwi arw Delhi NCR ni jwngri lagunni jahafradaw babonwi khami plan dong. Aasa khalamdon, lahkhanwi nungkhaya mwjwnfwr nagor khou naya! Be sathwwnwi gwdan gwdan khanainwi jayakhodon. Jai Hind!
normalised: Be I I T project ni uinw jabai Ghazipur landfill ao laikhidong nwi jakhini khou gajwli gabwlang khou, jikhaw sasi khou, picnic jakhini nu.
Bwihangmuna gajwli quality ni compost banai khou focus khou, jikhaw Haryana ni langkhani makhlao use khou, arw chemical fertilizer ni khou reliance khou gabwlang khou.
Be system ya sanzao approximately five hundred kilogram jakhini khou process khou, jani dongkham arw makhli ni jathab khou bwi-sakhini gangkhi sikhilaao banai khou, sanji ni khousabao.
Mithibaa, jidongkhou nwi marigold khou labh ni dongkhini banai khou!
Be khou gabwlang khou arw Delhi N C R ni mukhya bahani jakhini makhlao chalai khou ni plans dong.
Bwiaboi khou asha khou jwng gabon saokha shorabao!
Be ya sasi khou game-changer jabkhou.
